title: 17. Introduction to the Ego
description:
Feeling like there has to be more to yourself than how you look, what you've accomplished, and proving your worth to others? Feel like you can't seem to understand how others can be SO concerned only with themselves and how things affect them to the point where you feel dismissed and constantly criticized? This episode is for you!

 

Click here to get my new e-book the 3 Steps to Radical Self Forgiveness

...or click here to get a preview first :) 

 

Please don't forget to rate & review!

 

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.
Website: www.beatricekamau.com
